QuestData.Title: Aberrant Flora
QuestData.Description: Look how strangely the plant life reacts to the bloodpetals in the Roiling Gardens to the north. The trees are enveloped with more flowers and vines than usual. Large, sporous blossoms project themselves from the ground where they once did not.$b$bThe land is speaking to us, $r. The bloodpetals are destroying the balance.$b$bAs my final task, I ask you to visit the swarming adult Bloodpetals and prune their numbers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 11 Bloodpetals. Any type of adult Bloodpetal will do.
QuestData.CompletionText: We cannot move forward until you have put an end to the bloodpetals, $c.
QuestData.RewardText: The scent of bloodpetal pollen hangs about your head, $c. This is good.$b$bYou've earned your reward.
